text: Mūsā ga kare no hitobito ni itta toki o omoiokose. `Hitobito yo, dōshite anata gata wa watashi o kurushimeru no ka. Watashi ga, anata gata ni (tsukawasa reta) arrā no shitodearu koto o, shitte irude wanai ka.' Sore de kare-ra ga jōki o fumihazushita toki, arrā wa kare-ra no kokoro o mage rareta. Hontōni arrā wa,(arrā no) okite ni somuku mono o onmichibiki ni nara renai
